# GitHub Action: ZAP fullscan

MORE DETAILS COMMING.
Author: **Digdir Platform Team**

## Description

ZAP is a Dynamic Application Security Tester(DAST).

## Inputs

| Input | Description | Required |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `target_url` | URL of the application we want to test | true |
| `cmd_options` | Additional option flags to adjust the scan | false |

## Example Usage

## Documentation

- fullscan documentation: <https://www.zaproxy.org/docs/docker/full-scan/>
